mapper.select: SELECT seat.theater_hall_id, seat.id, seat.x_axis, seat.y_axis, seat.z_axis, seat.show, seat.row_name, seat.seat_name, seat.disabled, seat.wheel_chair, seat.seat_position_group, seat.seat_area_id, seat_area.name as seat_area_name, seat_area.price as seat_area_price, seat_area.color as seat_area_color, -- 判断当前用户是否选中，只处理未支付的，已支付的不考虑 CASE WHEN select_seat.user_id = #{userId} AND select_seat.select_seat_state = #{selected} THEN true ELSE false END AS selected, COALESCE(select_seat.select_seat_state, 1) AS select_seat_state FROM seat LEFT JOIN select_seat ON seat.theater_hall_id = select_seat.theater_hall_id AND seat.x_axis = select_seat.x AND seat.y_axis = select_seat.y AND select_seat.deleted = 0 AND select_seat.movie_show_time_id = ${movieShowTimeId} LEFT JOIN seat_area ON seat.seat_area_id = seat_area.id WHERE seat.theater_hall_id=${theaterHallId} AND seat.deleted = 0 ORDER BY seat.x_axis ASC, seat.y_axis ASC
